attributes.action: recognise his contribution to light entertainment and knight Bruce Forsyth.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It seems as if Brucie has been around for ever; he is a such familiar and much-loved person on our screens.  He has given so much laughter, fun and all-round entertainment, that he really deserves the ultimate honour and recognition that a knighthood would bestow.  He is the King of light entertainment and a part of our families.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
